title: CSA Issues Alert on Critical SmarterMail Bug Allowing Remote Code Execution
description: The Cyber Security Agency of Singapore (CSA) has issued a bulletin warning of a maximum-severity security flaw in SmarterTools SmarterMail email software that could be exploited to achieve remote code execution.
